Race.SpecificTitle: PW John K. Kelly Grand Bayou Reservoir Dist. -- 1 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide John K. Kelly Grand Bayou Reservoir District Proposition
(Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall the John K. Kelly Grand Bayou Reservoir District (the "District"), levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $251,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and supporting the Grand Bayou Resort, including acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities, equipment and programs therefor, and assisting Wildlife and Fisheries in controlling aquatic vegetation in Grand Bayou Reservoir?
